page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE 9.
page.content: When the children come in from school they watch television while the meal is cooking. We then have our meal (I have to put my husband's in the oven as he is not usually home) and then the children do their piano or flute practice and anything else they have to do for school or any other club they belong to. My children share a large bedroom and they start to get ready for bed at about 7.30 and 7.45p.m. When my husband comes home from work he has his dinner and either does some more office work or relaxes by reading watching television,listening to records or the radio. He then feeds the animals at about 10.p.m. and we go to bed between 10.30 and 11.30. I switch my automatic washing machine before I go to bed so that the washing is ready to hang out next day.
